context: Is the clicking on the keyboard quiet?
response: It isn't silent. The keys have good built-in resistance to spring back-up, which I like...but it does make some noise. Not as bad as the old IBM model M or something though. It is loud enough that you notice it when you are typing, but not so bad it bothers someone elsewhere in the room watching TV.

context: Does your system come with all the cords and controller?
response: This system does not come with the cords or controllers; it is ONLY the cube. The cords can be purchased fairly inexpensively from eBay or Amazon - I purchased cords for $12, including shipping and handling from eBay.

context: Do the pieces lay in the position that they fit together, so you don't have to rotate them. Does it have a back ground picture so you can tell if things are fitting together right.

context: Can the gears be moved to the left side of the wheel, or is it fixed on the right side?
response: you can moved them where you like, were its comfortable to you. the g27 are 3 separated pieces. pedal, wheel and shifter. so either left or right side will work.

context: This is labeled as a 901 but does not have the US key layout pictured. If I order it will I receive the proper keyboard?
response: As long as the model number is ROC-12-901, it is the US Layout. You can verify model #'s and foreign layouts here: http://www.roccat.org/Products/Gaming-Keyboards/ROCCAT-Isku-FX/#crb_4. Btw, it's an awesome keyboard, very pleased with it, but I do wish the control keys top center were also back-lit. Good luck.

context: Stream quality? Is the mic sound quality good enough to stream with? Im considering these or blue yeti/snowball but id prefer no stand on my desk
response: The mic is decent however unreliable, the headset is not great quality. I've had two randomly stop working. On materials being poor quality. Invest in Astro's.

context: How is the middle click (scroll wheel) on this mouse? Stiff? Light? Is it easy to click without accidentally scrolling at the same time?

I should tell you though that if you are using Ubuntu you will need to remap the buttons i.e. sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf as the Windows button mapping won't work out of the box for Linux.

context: Jeez, what EXACTLY does the red button on top do? Can IT be reprogrammed?
response: It's programmable power button

context: Will it work with Windows 8.1
response: I found out that I have Windows 7 and it work for me. So it should work for Windows 8.1

context: Do the mixture and prop controls work properly?
response: Yes, they work properly in X Plane

context: Is it worth it to buy this if my sole intention is to play the campaign?  Have no interest in KZ multiplayer.
response: It is worth it.  I never played the multiplayer one bit. I only played the campaign and it was amazing.  I have recently been thinking of getting it again to play thru again.  but if your looking for an amazing campaign this game has it.  I highly recommend it.

context: Does it play 3D games? Does it read movies in 3D?
response: Yes it does. It plays them perfectly

context: Is the wrist rest removable?
response: You'd have to put it on, first.  The wrist rest ships underneath the keyboard in the factory box.

context: Is this an official Nintendo Product and does it work with US Wii consoles even though it says "Use in Japan only"?
response: yes it plays on the wii console and It is an official product, it has serial numbers and the authentic Nintendo trademark symbol on the back on the controller. I play super smash bros brawl on the wii and it works perfectly and I play super smash bros melee on the gamecube and it works perfectly.

context: Does this left handed mouse click on the right side so I can rest my whole hand on the mouse and click with my index finger like righties do?
response: I have this mouse and it is actually hard wired left handed! (Although you can change anything with the configuration software.) So, the answer is YES!

context: If you have more than one player, do you need to have more than one steering wheel for them to play at the same time?
response: You don't need the steering wheel to play. You can play with just a regular wii remote. The steering wheel just makes it a little more like driving.

context: Does this work with Windows 8.1 computers?
response: Yes it does. Simply plug and play

context: How high is the ps4 with stand attached (exact figure please)?
response: 11 and one half inches....

context: Will this bundle arrive on release day? Or will we need to wait for it ship after the release date?
response: I think it can arrive on release day depending on where you live. Otherwise the soonest it will arrive is the 7th, depending on the shipping method you selected.EDIT: Alright all our e-mails came in today and the estimated is on the 8th, even though I chose 1-day shipping. Hopefully it shows up tomorrow or the 7th.

context: Can the Back and Forward buttons be customized to do in-game actions like throwing a grenade?
response: yes they can. i hav set my forward button for melee. nothin in the back button yet

context: Is it Xbox One compatible?
response: Yes, but you need to have the Xbox One Stereo Headset Adapter for your controller. That's what I use (since I got the headset before the One was out) and it works just as it would with the 360.

context: So far ive read it works on the PS4, Xbox1, PS3, and 360? Is it wireless for all systems? just plug them in the controller for sound and chat?
response: It is good for all systems it is powered through usb to a base then the base transmits signal to your headphones sound via optical cable that plugs into your system and to the base

context: can you play wii u games on this???
response: This  was actually a gift. My first thought is no. I did not see it in the ad.

context: How is the Flight Stick connected  to Xbox 360?
response: Right into the back of the module.  There's only one jack that it will fit.  Have fun.

context: will this game work with a normal wii, or only wii u?
response: It only works on Wii U. You can use Wii games on Wii U console, but you cannot use Wii U games on a Wii console. I hope this helps!

context: does it have offline multiplayer
response: This game has Online Multiplayer 2-18.  Do not see anything about Offline Multiplayer.  Hope this helps you.  Thank you for shopping our site, and have a wonderful day.

context: Can you dodge, block, and counter? Do you get health regain rings and necklace, and do you get health steal per hit armor?
response: you can, you can get health regain rings, the problem with the game I found not to my liking is that if you die, you start with less health compared to other games that you start with full health, the game is really difficult for me even at normal mode

context: Can you change to any color without the dpi changing? Or is each color locked into a dpi preset? Thanks!
response: Each color has its own DPI setting which you can change, so basically you can have any color you want with the sensitivity you want.

context: I have a Saitek Pro Flight Multi Panel but recently the knob to select alt, vs, etc is stuck, how can I do in order to fix it??
response: Saitek has a 2 year warranty providing you have proof of purchase. You must pay for return shipping, which I have done 3 times already for this item. At the last lockup, I used a wrench for a day or two, and it got past the sticking part.

context: How long is the cable, is there any way to lengthen it?
response: The cable is very long. I'd guess about almost 10ft. I honestly thought it was too long for me

context: Can u play PS VITA games on this because I don't See any other games that come with this HELP
response: No, you can NOT play PS VITA games on a PSP 3000 (Vita is the newest platform)

context: i had to reload this farming simulator 2013  game on my computer because it crashed where is the product key located

response: Is both a lot of audio in English and the subtitles are English too the voice acting is top-notch!

context: I am thinking of buying the physical copy (since the pc download feature seems unavailable.) If i get the physical copy can i use it on steam?
response: the physical copy comes with a steam download so you can play it on the desktop or on steam i play mine off of steam and my desktop version remains untouched

context: Will these support chat via the xbox one headset adapter?
response: You will be able to get audio from the xbox one to the headset but chat will not work

context: Looks like a good game, just not into monthly subscriptions. Is that the only way to play this?
response: Yes, I think it's around $12/month.

context: does this come with the lvl 90 boost?
response: No, it only grants you the agility to level up to 90. You still have to do the work. I will say that the kevels breeze by and give you a good feel for the expansion. The 90 boost can be bought, but does not come with the expansion.

context: What DLC is not included in this? The Headhunter packs?
response: I'm not sure about that one.  I was referring to being prompted for paying for various things such as characters and skins.  I didn't have xbox live for both accounts I was using.

context: will x box 360 games play in it
response: The only way to play 360 games on the Xbox One is to have a 360 and connect it via HDMI to the Xbox input.  It still requires a 360 though.

context: Will this work on phones, for emulators? Is it wireless?
response: Only if you have an OTG cable, as it uses a standard USB 2.0. Even then I'm not sure it would be compatible. It is not wireless.

context: It only blinks once or twice when I hit the button on the receiver is that normal? I can't sync it to my controller.
response: did you pick the right drivers when installing? also, you have to hit the button on your Xbox 360 controller while hitting the button on your receiver.

context: Is this a Gamepad only game or can a Wiimote be used with it?
response: I'm not sure I bpught it for my son

context: What are the base dimensions for the two parts?  I need to fit in 6.5" space.
response: Both are 6 and 5/8 by 6 and 5/8.  If your space is really that exact measurement with no leeway, they won't quite fit.

context: Does this work out of the box for PC or do I need to buy the "Universal Adapter"?
response: Tested and works with both PC and PS3 AS IS without issues. No adapter needed.
